articles.author: Emily Amato
articles.title: 9/11 First Responder Overcomes Cancer To Conquer Walt Disney World Half Marathon
articles.description: In 2018, Heather Yang was training to run her first half marathon when she was blindsided by a stage 3 colon cancer diagnosis. The diagnosis derailed Yang’s training and led to five months of chemotherapy – but none of that stopped her from running the Walt D…
articles.content: In 2018, Heather Yang was training to run her first half marathon when she was blindsided by a stage 3 colon cancer diagnosis. The diagnosis derailed Yangs training and led to five months of chemotherapy but none of that stopped her from running the Walt Disn… [+1205 chars]

articles.author: MELANIE J. SIMS Associated Press
articles.title: Like Miami, 'Bad Boys for Life' soundtrack is hot and fun
articles.description: The“Bad Boys for Life” soundtrack plays its part, bringing high energy to the Miami-based movie that sees characters Mike Lowrey (Will Smith) and Marcus Burnett (Martin Lawrence) back on-screen
articles.content:
Various artists, Bad Boys for Life Original Motion Picture Soundtrack" (Epic/We the Best Music)
Some soundtracks are as important to their movies as the actors delivering lines on-screen. But the Bad Boys for Life soundtrack is less of an unseen character, a… [+1493 chars]
